org.wildfly.security.sasl.util

Class AbstractSaslServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wildfly.security.sasl.util.AbstractSaslParticipant
      • org.wildfly.security.sasl.util.AbstractSaslServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SaslServer, SaslWrapper
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnonymousSaslServer, EntitySaslServer, Gs2SaslServer, LocalUserServer, OAuth2SaslServer, OTPSaslServer, ScramSaslServer

    public abstract class AbstractSaslServer
extends AbstractSaslParticipant
implements SaslServer
    A base class for SASL client implementations.
    Author:
    David M. Lloyd
